contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox city Japan |Name= Nakijin |JapaneseName= 今帰仁村<br><small>Nachijin</small> |settlement_type= Village |ImageSkyline= |ImageSize= |ImageCaption= |MapImage= Nakijin in Okinawa Map.gif |Region= [[Kyūshū region|Kyūshū]] |Prefecture= [[Okinawa Prefecture|Okinawa]] |District= [[Kunigami District, Okinawa|Kunigami]] |Area_km2= 39.87 |Population= 9,529 |PopDate= 2003 |Density_km2= auto |Coords= |LatitudeDegrees1= 26 |LatitudeMinutes1= 40 |LatitudeSeconds1= 57 |LongtitudeDegrees1= 127 |LongtitudeMinutes1= 58 |LongtitudeSeconds1= 22 |Postal code = |Area code = |Mayor = |Tree = |Flower = |Bird = |SymbolImage = Flag of Nakijin Okinawa.JPG |SymbolDescription = |CityHallPostalCode = |CityHallAddress = |CityHallPhone = |CityHallLink = [http://www.nakijin.jp/ Village of Nakijin] |CityMap = |Elevation = }} {{nihongo|'''Nakijin'''|今帰仁村|Nakijin-son|[[Kunigami language|Kunigami]]: ''Nachizin'', [[Okinawan language|Okinawan]]: ''Nachijin''}} is a [[villages of Japan|village]] located in [[Kunigami District, Okinawa|Kunigami District]], [[Okinawa Prefecture|Okinawa]], [[Japan]]. As of 2003, the village has an estimated [[population]] of 9,529 and a [[population density]] of 239.00 persons per km². The total area is 39.87 km². ==Education== The village operates its public elementary and junior high schools. [[Okinawa Prefectural Board of Education]] operates [[Hokuzan High School]][http://www.hokuzan-h.open.ed.jp/]. ==Famous people from Nakijin== *[[Munetsugu Kayo]], boxer *[[Seiji Shimota]], novelist *[[Seizen Nakasone]], linguist *[[Shokichi Uehara]], politician and businessperson *[[Shun Medoruma]], novelist ==See also== *[[Nakijin Castle]] ==External links== {{Commons category-inline}} * [http://www.nakijin.jp/ Nakijin official website] {{ja icon}} [[Category:Villages in Okinawa Prefecture]] [[Category:Port settlements in Japan]] {{Okinawa-geo-stub}}
